title: WBIDC moves Calcutta HC challenging arbitration award to Tata Motors over abandoned Singur plant
description: In its appeal, WBIDC claimed that it had been denied equal opportunity during the hearings before the arbitral tribunal. The corporation said it was not given full opportunity to present its case before the three-member tribunal.
